snippet: Eight of 10 industry groups in the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose a day after the Federal Reserve indicated it was in no hurry to raise a major bank interest rate.
abstract: Stocks rise amid encouraging economic news and announcement by Federal Reserve that it will not hurry to raise an important bank lending rate.
lead_paragraph: Eight of 10 industry groups in the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose a day after the Federal Reserve indicated it was in no hurry to raise a major bank interest rate.

headline.main: Fed Reassurances and Solid Data on Economy Lift Wall St.
headline.print_headline: Fed Reassurances and Solid Data on Economy Lift Wall St.
